filesystem.help: Options are default, FAT or LITTLE. If default value the filesystem is chosen by the blockdevice type

blockdevice.help: Options are default, SPIF, DATAFLASH, QSPIF, SD or other. If default the block device will be chosen by the defined component. If other, override get_other_blockdevice() to support block device out of Mbed OS tree.

external_size.help: Size in bytes of the external block device, if default the maximum size available is used.

external_base_address.help: The default will set start address to address 0

folder_path.help: Path for the working directory where the FileSystemStore stores the data
